apple_vendor_description: This heartwarming emoji, as rendered on Apple devices, depicts a couple embracing, with the woman showcasing a medium-dark skin tone and her partner a medium skin tone, both nestled within a soft, glowing heart. Apple's signature 3D shading creates a tangible depth, making the figures appear almost as if they are emerging from the screen, while the heart pulsates with a gentle, warm light. The smooth gradients and rounded edges contribute to an overall feeling of tenderness and affection, perfectly conveying deep love and connection in digital conversations.
